summary: Struggling artist fakes his own death so his works will increase in value.
cast: James Garner|Dick Van Dyke|Elke Sommer|Angie Dickinson|Ethel Merman|Carl Reiner|Pierre Olaf|Miiko Taka|Roger C. Carmel|Irving Jacobson|Jay Novello|Naomi Stevens|Renzo Cesana|Leon Belasco|Louis Mercier|Maurice Marsac|Fifi D'Orsay|Marcel Hillaire|Dawn Villere|Nan Martin|Victoria Carroll|Sharon Shore|Astrid De Brea|Ralph Brooks|Jean Del Val|George DeNormand|Émile Genest|Brad Johnson|Mathew McCue|Paul Préboist|Cosmo Sardo|Rolfe Sedan|Charles Sherlock|Olan Soule|Hal Taggart|Arthur Tovey|Paul Verdier
title: El arte de amar
